Question: Kuen Tong Industrial Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kuen Tong Industrial Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- IATF16949/ ISO9001 certified OEM/ ODM manufacturing company
- Specializes in CNC machining, forging, casting, and friction stir welding
- Offers a wide range of quality products including aerospace components, vehicle components, motorcycle components, and bicycle parts
- Committed to providing comprehensive support services from metal fabrication to surface treatment
- Relocated headquarters to a 6,300 square meter industrial area in 2013 to increase research/production capabilities
- Tier 1 supplier to leading brands in various industries, including US Top electric vehicle (EV) manufacturer, British largest motorcycle manufacturer, and US largest mobile phone manufacturer
- Devoted to constant improvement and innovative projects
- Established in 1997, with a focus on being a one-stop solution and a loyal business partner in the global supply chain
Summary_cn:
群通工業股份有限公司

CES 2024產品亮點

- IATF16949/ ISO9001認證的原始設備製造商（OEM）/原始設計製造商（ODM）生產公司
- 專注於數控加工、鍛造、鑄造和搅拌摩擦焊接
- 提供包括航空航天零部件、汽車零部件、摩托車零部件和自行車部件在內的多種優質產品
- 致力於提供從金屬加工到表面處理的全面支持服務
- 2013年搬遷總部至一個佔地6,300平方米的工業區，以增加研發/生產能力
- 是領先品牌的一級供應商，包括美國頂尖電動車製造商、英國最大的摩托車製造商和美國最大的手機製造商
- 致力於不斷改進和創新項目
- 成立於1997年，致力於成為全球供應鏈中的一站式解決方案和忠實商業合作夥伴
